_sText:
this is a bobm defuse map where the terrorist have to go trough a maze to find the bombzone. there are three weapons hidden whitin the map, the firstone is inside the wierd looking block, and the too others is further in to the wrong direction, both hidden inside blocks. while the terrorists is runing trough the maze, the counter terrorists have to chose betwen three different ways. the first one leads to a room containing AWP and a teleporter leading to the top of the map (the metalthing you can se one the overwievs. the second leads to a room with shotguns and then to the middle of the maze. the third leads to a M4 room and then to under the entire map, where they can kill the T from below. The CT can go to a secret room with buyzone as well. when the T have completed the maze, they push a button and goes into a room with the bombzone (watch the water, or else you COULD get killed, because there is where you come from after visiting the buyzone) plant the bomb quickly amd push the button under the arrow. a huge block will come up and block the path for the CT (exept for a space big as a door) making it easyer to suvive for the TÂ´s.
If you need help finding secret areas, send a PM.
